member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Compiler.CSharpCompiler
member.summary:
CSharp compiler used to automatically compile the generated adaptor source files to an applicable assembly.
Most of the code of this compiler was taken from the VS.NET example at: http://www.codeproject.com/dotnet/CodeFromCode.asp

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Compiler.ICSharpCompiler
member.summary:
The C# compiler interfaces provided by the Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Compiler component.
TODO: Describe usage protocol.

member.summary: Starts the compilation process.

member.summary: Property to get the results of the compiler.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Compiler.CSharpCompiler.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new CSharpCompiler. Before the Compile() method is called, FilesToCompile and, if needed, the other properties have to be set.
